Game.Name: Formation Soccer - On J. League (Japan)
Game.plot: Formation Soccer on J.League is a Sports game, developed and published by Human Entertainment,which was released in Japan in 1994.Cheat: Cheat CodesAfter turning on the game, at the "Human" logo, press Down + Select. If done right, a prompt will appear asking you to enter a password. Input any of the following codes and you will enter the sound test menu. Once there, hold Run and press Select to reset the game and the cheats will be activated.
Game.Notes: Formation Soccer on J.League is a Sports game, developed and published by Human Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1994.
